title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 442.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 442.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish a foundation for
uniform reporting by hospitals. In making their reports, hospitals will be
bound by the basic principles and concepts set forth in this Article. Any
reporting principles and concepts not specifically discussed herein should be
reported according to generally accepted accounting principles as interpreted
in the opinions of the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants
(AICPA) and in the statements by the Financial Accounting Standards

Board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
442.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
